title: AI Will Kill Gold, But Bitcoin Comes out Stronger, Predicts Nick Szabo
description: Nick Szabo believes artificial intelligence will destroy gold, but it is a win for Bitcoin
content:
Nick Szabo, one of the first people to come up with the idea of digital scarcity, decided to mix things up a bit by suggesting that AI could end up being the biggest enemy of gold, while also working in Bitcoin's favour.
In his opinion, once AI start... [1019 chars]

title: RM5.9bil allocated for R&D, development in the AI sector, says PM
description: KUALA LUMPUR: Some RM5.9bil has been allocated for research, development, commercial and innovation activities in the artificial intelligence (AI) sector, says Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim.
content:

title: TCS Plans To Create 5,000 New Jobs In UK In 3 Years
description: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), a multinational IT services provider, on Friday announced the launch of an Artificial Intelligence (AI) experience zone and design studio in London, reaffirming its continued strategic investment across the UK.

title: Do not ask AI for marriage advice
description: Artificial intelligence chatbots are not designed to give good marriage advice — they are designed to make money by monopolizing attention.
content:
“What was happening, unbeknownst to me at the time, was she was dredging up all of these things that we had previously worked on, and putting it into ChatGPT,” one anonymous husband told Futurism.
The husband later found out his wife was using OpenAI... [2111 chars]

title: While AI can do a lot, there are still certain things it can’t do
description: Goldman Sachs predicts artificial intelligence may displace up to 300 million jobs by 2027. Of course, I acquired that information from AI, so I have no idea if it’s true or if AI is just trying to bully me into making friends with it so it won’t render me as obsolete at work as I am at home.

title: Artificial intelligence fears are misplaced
description: There's nothing scary about the progress we can achieve with the power of artificial intelligence.
content: Amid shaken trust in U.S. institutions, information is our most valuable currency. Enter artificial intelligence, which is revolutionizing our access to information and informing Americans in ways once thought unimaginable. From politics to law and m... [4642 chars]

title: Global financial watchdogs to ramp up monitoring of AI
description: LONDON (Reuters) -Global financial regulators have laid out plans for closer monitoring of the risks as banks and other parts of the financial industry ramp up the use of artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence to cause 'homework apocalypse' in Irish schools
description: AI expert Rita Bateson said schools here face being overwhelmed if they do not enact policies to govern its use
content:
